ai-ja345:1.2_0: a conflagration with a blackened trail,
ai-ja345:2.1_0: “There are trees in the midst of a tree,
ai-ja345:2.2_0: the fruit of the stream-entry and the expels,
ai-ja345:2.4_0: They’re time to pass away, not.”
ai-ja345:3.1_0: Hurrying when it’s time to dawdle;
ai-ja345:3.2_0: And when it’s time to cross,
ai-ja345:4.1_0: Dawdling when it’s time to dawdle;
ai-ja345:4.2_0: hurrying when it’s time to hurry;
